Hamish Gray

Digital designer, front-end developer

Hi there!

Welcome to my little corner of the internet. I've been working in the field of design since 2009 with experience wide ranging experience from print and branding, to video editing and web development. My passion truly lies in developing brand systems that span all formats and create a joyful experience for people to discover.

Stay a while and explore my work, and please feel free to drop me a line.
